column2: Make a ransom offer to all prisoners.
Character is asked to pay ransom.
[Root.Host.GetTitledFirstName] offered to release me from prison if I pay a ransom.
I will pay for my freedom, if I can afford it.
You have received a ransom request for one of your courtiers. It is a good deal...
I will pay to get them back.
I will not pay to get them back.
